document.docAuthor: Pandher, Manpreet S., Kaur, Simarjit, Parey, Sajad H. & Saini, Malkiat S.
document.masterDocTitle: Review of genus Hydropsyche Pictet 1834 (Insecta: Trichoptera: Hydropsychidae) from India

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of genus Hydropsyche Pictet 1834 (Insecta: Trichoptera: Hydropsychidae) from India

subSubSection.paragraph:
1)
Hydropsyche briseus Malicky & Chantaramongkol.
Nepal; India (Manipur).
Hydropsyche briseus Malicky & Chantaramongkol 2000
, 807, 845, Table 19. Holotype—Male; Nepal: Chitwan (HMC).
Malicky 2006 , 241–264; Oláh & Johanson 2008 , 145; Morse 2016.

2)
Hydropsyche camillus Malicky & Chantaramongkol.
Thailand; Vietnam;
India ( Sikkim , Himachal
Pradesh). NEW RECORD.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Hydropsyche camillus Malicky & Chantaramongkol 2000
, 809, Table 12. Holotype—Male ; Thailand : Mogitan ( HMC ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Armitage et al . 2005
, 31;
Nuntakwang et al . 2007
, 257–262; Oláh & Johanson 2008 , 137; Laudee & Prommi 2011,279–287; Bunulue et al . 2012, 7; Morse 2016. Additional material examined: INDIA: Himachal Pradesh: Saho, 1800 m , 13-ix-2008 , 7 males, Pandher, NZC. Sikkim: Singhik, 1500 m , 14-ix-2009 , 2 males, 5 females, Pandher & Parey, NZC.

3)
Hydropsyche charon Malicky & Chanaramongkol.
Bhutan; India (Assam, Uttarakhand).
Hydropsyche charon Malicky & Chanaramongkol 2000
, 810, 842, Table 16. Holotype—Male; Bhutan: Prov. Paro (HMC).
Oláh & Johanson 2008 , 124; Morse 2016.
Additional material examined: See text.

4)
Hydropsyche chotanagpurensis
,
NOMEN NOVUM
. India ( Jharkhand
,
West Bengal , Odisa
,
Bihar ,
Chattisgarh).

Diplectrona ulmeri Martynov 1935
, 182–184, 208, figs. 85, 86a–86b, 87a–87c. Holotype—Male; India : Chota Nagpur (NZC).

Malicky & Chantaramongkol, 2000 , 811: Original illustration of
Diplectrona ulmeri Martynov
republished, transferred from
Diplectrona
and
Ceratopsyche
to
Hydropsyche
, making
Hydropsyche ulmeri ( Martynov 1935 )
a junior homonym of
Hydropsyche ulmeri Barnard 1934
(Morse 2016).

Additional material examined: INDIA : Jammu & Kashmir : Verinag ,
1900 m
,
12-viii-2009
, 1 male , 4 females , Pandher & Parey, NZC
.
Himachal Pradesh : Anni ,
1250 m
,
27-vi-2009
, 1 male , 3 females , Pandher & Parey, NZC; Gairsain,
1700 m
,
16-vi-2009
, 1 male , 7 females , Pandher& Parey, NZC.

5)
Hydropsyche dike Malicky & Chantaramongkol.
India (Kerala).

Hydropsyche dike Malicky & Chantaramongkol 2000
, 809–811, 838, Table 12. Holotype—Male; India: Kerala (HMC).
Oláh & Johanson 2008 , 125; Morse 2016.

6)
Hydropsyche diktys Malicky & Chantaramongkol.
India (Arunachal Pradesh).
Hydropsyche diktys Malicky & Chantaramongkol 2000
, 810, 842, Table 16.
Oláh & Johanson 2008 , 125; Morse 2016.

7)
Hydropsyche ekaropa Oláh & Schefter.
India (Manipur).

Hydropsyche ekaropa Oláh & Schefter 2008
, in Oláh & Johanson 2008 , 5, 125–126, 245, figs. 207–210.

8)
Hydropsyche gautamittra Schmid.
Pakistan; Afghanistan; Nepal; India (Uttarakhand).
Hydropsyche gautamittra Schmid 1961
, 200, pl. 17, figs. 4–6. Holotype—Male; Pakistan: Balakot (CNC).

9)
Hydropsyche homunculus Schmid.
China; India (Uttarakhand), NEW RECORD .
Hydropsyche homunculus Schmid 1965
, 138, 141, pl. V, figs. 1–3. Holotype—Male; China: [Zhejiang] Wenchow (ZFMK).

Hur et al. 1999
, 13; Malicky & Chanaramongkol 2000 , 812; Morse 2016. Additional material examined: See text.

10)
Hydropsyche keralana Oláh & Barnard.
India (Kerala).

Hydropsyche keralana Oláh & Barnard 2008
, in Oláh & Johanson 2008 , 5, 57, 138–139, 246, figs. 226–230.
India (Jammu & Kashmir).

Hydropsyche nuristanica Schmid 1963
, 437, figs. 1–3.

Synonym:
Hydropsyche darvazica Ivanov 1991
, 4–6, figs. 2a–2e ( Mey 1999, 228 ); Holotype— Male; Tadzhikistan (ZIL).
Additional material examined: See text.

12)
Hydropsyche rakshakaha Oláh.
Pakistan; Myanmar; Nepal; Bhutan;
India ( Assam , Jammu & Kashmir,
Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand, West Bengal).

Hydropsyche rakshakaha Oláh 1994
, 282, figs. 1A, 1B.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype—Male ; Pakistan :
North-West Frontier Province
( HNHM ).

subSubSection.paragraph: Additional material examined: See text.

13)
Hydropsyche shillonga Oláh & Barnard.
India (Assam).

Hydropsyche shillonga Oláh & Barnard 2008
, in Oláh & Johanson 2008 , 5, 150–151, 247, figs. 256–260.

14)
Hydropsyche uvana Mey.
Vietnam; Laos;
India ( Meghalaya , Manipur )
; Thailand; Myanmar.
Hydropsyche uvana Mey 1995 : 213
, 214, figs.13–14.
Holotype—Male; Vietnam : North Vietnam ( MPC ).
